article_title: Hail to the Victors of the Harbaugh Sweepstakes: Sports Retort Podcast
article_text:
Jim Harbaugh appears to be headed to Michigan. Getty Images

Hail to the victors of the Jim Harbaugh sweepstakes: Michigan.

The Sports Retort podcast discusses how landing the most prized coach of the offseason will boost the Wolverines fortunes. Kevin Clark discusses how the rest of the coaching carousel will shake out.

Plus, our favorite sports moments of 2014, including the World Cup, Sochi, California Chrome and Roger Federer regaining his top form at Wimbledon.

Subscribe to the Sports Retort on iTunes.

Here’s an MP3 link to the latest Sports Retort.

Post comments on Twitter: #sportsretort.

Follow on Twitter:

Jim Chairusmi (@jimchair)

Jason Gay (@JasonWSJ)

Kevin Clark (@KevinClarkWSJ)

Note: The Sports Retort is taking a temporary hiatus but we will be back in the recording studio in the coming weeks. Thank you for listening and your continued support of the podcast.
